attributes.title: Buick - General Motors
attributes.description:
Buick Enclave. The map is very simple yet also very difficult to portray. The Buick Enclave is manufactured in Michigan and disributed throughout North America, exported to Europe and exported to Shanghai GM where it is then sold in mainland China. 
In the automotive industry, the product is delivered to so many dealerships directly from the manufacturer, it is difficult to show on a map. Therefore, I have highlighted the Livingston Vehicle Transportation locations in Canada to show the major outlets where vehicles would be transported through. From those shipping yards, trucks take the vehicles to individual dealerships across the country.
One of the many Livingston Vehicle Transportation Stations located across Canada for easy shipment from manufacturers to dealerships.
attributes.title: Livingston Vehicle Transportation

attributes.description:
Manufacturing Plant for GM vehicles located in Shanghai, China. The Buick Enclave is manufactured in Michigan and exported to Shanghai GM where it is sold in the mainland. 
The #1 automotive manufacturer sold in China is Buick.
attributes.title: Shanghai GM

attributes.description: Assembly Plant containing the Buick Enclave.
attributes.title: Lansing Delta Township Assembly
Livingston Vehicle Transportation
attributes.address: 2810 West Fort Street #106, Detroit, MI 48216, USA
attributes.description: This is another Livingston Transportation Station located close to the GM manufacturing plant. This illustrates the ease in which vehicles are manufactured, loaded, and distributed around the world.

attributes.title: Lansing Delta Township Assembly to Shanghai GM
attributes.description:
The Buick Enclave is manufactured in Michigan and exported to Shanghai where it is sold throughout China's mainland.
In 2011, Buick has now sold over 3 million of their vehicles in China alone. 

Gale, Z. (2011, April 26). Buick of china passes 3 million sales mark since opening in 1999. Motortrend, Retrieved from http://wot.motortrend.com/buick-china-passes-3-million-sales-mark-opening-1999-72355.html
